mapper.insert: insert into message values((select max(message_no)+1 from message), #{message_from_no},#{message_to_no},#{message_title},#{message_content}, to_date(#{message_date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),default)
mapper.select: select count(*) as listCount from message where message_to_no=#{message_to_no}
mapper.update: update message set message_confirm='Y' where message_no=#{message_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from message where message_to_no = #{emp_no} and message_confirm = 'N'
select count(*) as listCount from emp e,message m where m.message_to_no=#{message_to_no} and e.emp_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%' and e.emp_no=m.message_from_no

select * from (select rownum rnum,emp_name,message_from_no,message_title,message_content,message_date,message_no,message_confirm,dept_name,job_name from (select rownum rnum,emp_name,message_from_no,message_title,message_content, to_char(message_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as message_date,message_no,message_confirm,dept_name,job_name from message m,emp e,dept d,job j where m.message_to_no=#{message_to_no} and e.emp_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%' and e.emp_no=m.message_from_no and d.dept_no=e.dept_no and j.job_no=e.job_no order by m.message_confirm asc,m.message_date desc)) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select count(*) listCount from emp e,message m where message_from_no=#{message_from_no} and e.emp_no=m.message_from_no
select count(*) as listCount from emp e,message m where m.message_from_no=#{message_from_no} and e.emp_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%' and e.emp_no=m.message_to_no
